quotes.quote: The preparation is what allows the success to happen naturally.
By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail.
The best preparation for tomorrow is to do today's work extremely well.

You must prepare for success even if there is no indication of it. You must prepare for success even if you have become accustomed to failure. You must prepare for success even if nobody in your life ever achieved anything. Take time to prepare hard.
Most people fail in life because they were not prepared for the opportunities when they appeared.
Preparedness is the ultimate confidence builder.
Preparedness and punctuality are two of the most important qualities of a leader.
You can't prepare for the details of every single possible thing that might come your way in the future, because the future is uncertain.
Peace is our goal but preparedness is the price we must pay.
Preparation doesn't assures victory, it assures confidence.
The best preparation for the future is the present well seen to, and the last duty done.
What you are prepared to do in order to achieve what you want is the only cost involved in achieving that goal.
Success is where preparation and opportunity meet.
With adequate planning, passion and perseverance, you can achieve the God-given goals.
Doing your preparation in advance and then letting your brain process the information while you sleep helps to cement this information in your memory making it easier to access the next day.
The best preparation for good work tomorrow is to do good work today.
Preparedness never caused a war and unpreparedness never prevented one.
Prepare for the unknown by studying how others in the past have coped with the unforeseeable and the unpredictable.
The better you're prepared, the better chance you'll have at staying on top of everything that is coming your way.
Be prepared for trouble. Don't fall apart when trouble strikes.
The fear of losing anything is the inability to prepare for the best.
Preparation through education is less costly than learning through tragedy.
Preparedness, when properly pursued, is a way of life, not a sudden, spectacular program.
Despair is most often the offspring of ill-preparedness.
He who is best prepared can best serve his moment of inspiration.
The best preparation for tomorrow is to do today's work superbly well.
The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
Expect the best. Prepare for the worst. Capitalize on what comes.
There's only one way to assure consistently good work. That is consistently thorough preparation.
Preparation is what allows the teacher to truly inspire. Preparation is in knowing exactly how the lesson plan will flow. It's in knowing what questions to ask and what answers to give.
